in that they have six jointed legs

they do n't have chocolate cake every day to keep them getting hungry

then of tiny muscles at the back of the mouth they pump up the sap

mother does n't know anything about them

Mother has heard of a scale insect out in California which has been a great nuisance to fruit-growers
a scale has been a great to fruit-growers
A certain ladybug finds this cottony-cushion scale a tender morsel so "
many ladybugs were taken out there to help the owners of the fruit farms rid of the scale
they carry them all the way out
they got a Pullman car for them

that I can tell you any more

Sometimes a caterpillar will thrive on just one kind of a plant
until it has grown as large as possible
Then it spins itself a nice silken cocoon
it rolls itself up in a soft leaf
it takes a long long nap
now it is for us to take a nap too "
